headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Kill Quota
content: The mark of a true master is adaptability, and you'll put yours to the test in Kill Quota. Your team starts with a set weapon, and you'll stay with it until you’ve racked up enough kills to move onto the next. You’ll need expertise in everything from RPGs to pool cues to make it through the whole loadout: first team to get enough kills with every weapon wins.
